ZLEL documentation¶

This documentation belongs to the ZLEL project (Linear and Nonlinear Electrical Circuits), developed as part of the course “Zirkuitu Linealak eta Ez-Linealak” at the University of the Basque Country (UPV/EHU).

It includes the complete source code documentation, simulation engine details, and guides to perform DC, transient, and operating point analyses using the ZLEL Python-based simulator.

Authors: - Eneko Aranburu (earanburu006@ikasle.ehu.eus) - Alvaro Beltran (abeltrandenanc002@ikasle.ehu.eus)

See the reStructuredText documentation for syntax help.
